prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Brass, Drums, Guitar, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Bass, Brass, Drums, and Guitar, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Bass, Brass, Drums, and Guitar, omitting the Synth Lead.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Piano, Bass, Brass, Drums, and Guitar, with no Synth Lead.
